data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=DsGSik527F8Q7kNvgFEkNNR&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAX5jc_grYKIYXCoCWKa1q8MjMiMhKmDS5KBgligl-FfA&oe=66AA209C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=oWdOObBE8QUQ7kNvgGVDK1Y&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAZg0ohK2A555TUDWb8mYR2R_pHoUGKz7tYYOgASIfh1w&oe=66AA2A24)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=f8z2HqvVFtUQ7kNvgHBNIpG&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCOYsxkPkWkln_dWOnIFr6t0cXld6655w4PVvFdVkGpFQ&oe=66AA1187)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ZT4mbkcO-hgQ7kNvgF-QeI-&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBBBltW8RVnj9B9heDIyMQxheKxDnM9W51RsqMxEmbPjg&oe=66AA0466)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=XsGh3FbJNcgQ7kNvgFm4fW8&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCz2FQhPlCL5tRmPE-1AlO-nDvrD7zhYUXaGKUJXsZWVg&oe=66AA30D8)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=tfu-JQWKV5cQ7kNvgEinp9z&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAnx9nbwkYDHnbcT6JokEX6C_lPXhJQp-aphOM4BpmzeQ&oe=66AA2D59)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=HODvnANTutQQ7kNvgH_7t5W&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB_WneBepOXGbLVW6N2tr60WlITXNB_io7mrgzxvZ-D2Q&oe=66AA1370)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=BnMCW2oW_VMQ7kNvgEuGzRp&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAE7Al3PNfZJaJZizYg-NqRkDlJ6fYXln1QgRJkg_xP0Q&oe=66A9FDEA)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=duXZXcvI4oYQ7kNvgHbEssv&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCTCICJcgVmxRKHEuDBDT-o-0duZP2UjBS8BIITxWyrHg&oe=66AA1197)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=SE6cze_nw3sQ7kNvgHBo7ts&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCCesPiQCHPaq3Sj6lWHyFTSwmVJ-c1d8MR9nwHv18GZQ&oe=66AA2D0C)
